website_summaries.verdict: A premium option for people looking for the absolute best upgrade to make to their vehicle's sound and infotainment system.
pros: A large number of advanced features to add to most cars with a double din space
The screen is large and clear to read
Touchscreen capability is fast and responsive
Comes with built-in music apps like IHeartRadio and Pandora
cons: Premium infotainment features don't directly impact the vehicle's sound output

customer_reviews.title: Buy the right accessories jvc and apple not the knock offs
customer_reviews.text: Nice haven't been disappointed once you get the jvc wires and official apple hdmi adapter it works great don't be cheap and get hdmi adapter it won't work trust me I tried it after I got the jvc hdmi and nothing bought an apple adapter and it worked perfect
customer_reviews.author: waltercourts

customer_reviews.title: This jvc radio worked perfect. I have an iPhone and I also got ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a single din kenwood radio in my car. Personally I wanted to add a radio with screen so I could play videos off my phone to my car screen. This jvc radio worked perfect. I have an iPhone and I also got the Apple hdmi to iPhone port. This allowed my iPhone screen to appear on my radio screen. Equalizer allows to great options to find the perfect sound quality you want. Only dislike was the custom background screen options. If it's a personal picture you could barely see the options on the home screen. Also USB port is only for charging. Other than that perfect buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was expecting the HDMI to work with other devices, ...
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting the HDMI to work with other devices, but I believe it can only work with MHL. However there isn't much information given for the use of HDMI with this screen!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Mussayab

customer_reviews.title: And now I can't return it because I'm just out of the return range so I'm stuck with this hunk of crap. DO NOT
customer_reviews.text: Currently everytime I try to use the bluetooth feature and my phone won't stay connected. Then when you try to adjust the speakers at all it never quite sounds right at all. This thing isn't worth the money at all. And now I can't return it because I'm just out of the return range so I'm stuck with this hunk of crap. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Jesse C Arnett

customer_reviews.title: Figure it all out first
customer_reviews.text: This receiver is a bargain. Has all the bells and whistles and it's affordable. Only thing I could ask for is more screen customization and a truly adjustable eq but I do realize the model up(820bt) has that feature. I'm am pleased with sound quality due to the xover and sub options. It is a bit confusing at first with all the different connection options but take your time to learn the os and you'll be surprised how much you can do with the receiver. Seamless app integration including Spotify pandora iHeartRadio and Waze. Watch dvds in the back and listen to radio in the front. It does its job very well and I'm happy I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: TonyDIY

customer_reviews.title: JVC app only works with Samsung S4
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt seem yo switch between phones very well. The apps will not work with anything later than Samsung S4. Very unintuitive and slow user interface.
customer_reviews.author: S. C.

customer_reviews.title: really like radio, but havent' gotten the JVC android app ...
customer_reviews.text: really like radio, but havent' gotten the JVC android app to work with it. other bluetooth and google auto works great
customer_reviews.author: MikeK

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The HDMI input is *Extremely* specific and will not function with most HDMI devices (Don't consider it a proper AV input) but, the worst part about this stereo is the LCD, it looks and feels like a color LCD from the early 90s, the viewing angles are 100% in front of it or nothing and *even then* the picture is washed out and very, very ugly. The included themes are hideous. It felt *worse* than non-brand Chinese double-dins that I've owned, if you're wondering why this is so cheap, from JVC with all these features, now you know. If you want something even remotely good looking and functional, pass on this.
customer_reviews.author: yo dawg

customer_reviews.title: love it!!! best on market
customer_reviews.text: One of the best radios on the market ...Excellency sound quality with tons apps and options the HDMI mhl feature with mirror link is awesome ... My best purchase from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Terrell Myers

customer_reviews.title: I love it the only bad things is that it does ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it the only bad things is that it does but connect the blue tooth go other devices but mine. And i tried doing it too mamy times. And even tried re installing it again and still no luck
customer_reviews.author: Mari&Junior
